name: Extrovert
tagline: Warm-up and nurture prospects at scale on linkedin
description: Track your customers' posts, spot key conversations with AI, and help your team build trust with thoughtful comments - in minutes a day.

name: Aqua Voice
tagline: Incredibly fast voice input for Mac and Windows
description: Aqua is super fast AI dictation that lets you talk into any text field -- Cursor, Gmail, Slack, even your terminal. It starts up in under 50ms, inserts text as fast as 450ms, and has state-of-the-art accuracy. Write 4x faster anywhere with Aqua. ðŸŒŠ

name: Potpie AI
tagline: Create custom AI agents for your code
description: Build task-oriented custom agents for your codebase that perform engineering tasks with high precision powered by intelligence and context from your data. Build agents for use cases like system design, debugging, integration testing, onboarding etc.

name: GPT-4.1 in the API
tagline: Announcing GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, & GPT-4.1 nano in the API
description: A new series of GPT models featuring major improvements on coding, instruction following, and long contextâ€”plus our first-ever nano model.

name: Notion Mail
tagline: The first inbox that thinks like you
description: Introducing Notion Mail: it organizes itself, drafts emails, and schedules meetings any way youâ€™d like. Connect your Gmailâ€”itâ€™s free to get started.

name: ServiceAgent
tagline: AI voice agent for home services
description: ServiceAgent is a Call Answering AI Agent built specifically for home service businesses. Trained on industry-specific data, conversations to book appointments, handle customer inquiries, and capturing every lead 24/7 while your team focuses on customers.

name: Bilanc
tagline: Measure the impact of AI on engineering productivity
description: Bilanc is an AI-powered Engineering Management Platform. We help companies measure and improve developer productivity using AI. We use LLMâ€™s to estimate the effort put into every merged PR, and we measure the boost that AI has on engineering productivity.

name: DocsHound
tagline: AI turns demos into instant docs, chatbots & user insights
description: DocsHound turns product demos into full documentation, chatbots, and product education. Capture your UI onceâ€”get docs, support bots, and marketing content auto-generated. Perfect for onboarding, support, customer-facing teams, and internal operations.

name: n8nChat
tagline: Create automations in seconds by generating n8n workflows
description: n8nChat brings AI directly into your n8n workflow editor. Describe what you want to automate in plain English, and watch as it instantly generates complete nodes and workflows. Like Cursor but for n8n, it can create, edit, debug, and optimize your workflows.

name: BeRoomie
tagline: Roommate matching app to find compatible roommates
description: BeRoomie is like Tinder, but for finding roommates. Swipe through potential roomies based on lifestyle, habits, and vibe. Match with people who share your preferences and chat instantly. Itâ€™s a fun, intuitive way to find someone you actually want to live with.

name: Tiptap Editor Template and UI Components
tagline: Build rich editor UIs faster with React components
description: We released a free simple editor template and a library of MIT-licensed React UI components for Tiptap. Drop in pre-built toolbars, menus, and more, or customize every detail. Includes a CLI to scaffold your editor UI in seconds.

name: Whyser
tagline: Conduct and analyze user interviews at scale
description: Whyser is a qualitative research platform that conducts AI-moderated user interviews on your behalfâ€”so you can uncover actionable customer insights at scale in hours instead of weeks. Whyser makes research happen when it otherwise wouldnâ€™t.

name: AutoMCP
tagline: Easily deploy your existing AI agent projects as MCP servers
description: A library and platform to easily convert and deploy your existing agent and multi-agent projects as MCP servers for use with MCP clients like Cursor and Claude Desktop.

name: Qibble
tagline: The world's poll repository where you discover who's right
description: Qibble is the place to find out whoâ€™s rightâ€”itâ€™s the worldâ€™s largest poll repository, where you can create, vote and get insights on your polls. Help us achieve global consensus!

name: Img2Sheet
tagline: AI that reads your receipts and fills your Google Sheet
description: Upload an image and instantly get structured data in your Google Sheetâ„¢. Img2Sheet automates data entry using AI, with secure, pay-per-use pricing and zero manual work.

name: Subly AI Video Accessibility Checker
tagline: AI Agent that detects issues and shows you where to fix them
description: An AI agent that auto-detects accessibility issues and identifies whether WCAG standards are met in pre-recorded video and audio. Scans every file frame by frame, flags issues, and delivers a clear, structured, time-coded report for faster, confident fixes.

name: Iterato
tagline: AI-powered product manager to collect feedback
description: Iterato doesnâ€™t just collect feedback â€” it talks to your users, understands their pain points, and turns every response into actionable insights, just like your best Product Manager would.

name: Blueprint
tagline: Keep your design and engineering team in-sync
description: Blueprint is designed to make UX documentation faster and more intuitive. Simply import your Figma designs and create UX flows on the grid-based canvas. With Blueprint, organizing UI designs and mapping user flows feels hassle-free.

name: Dropcontact
tagline: Find verified emails - No database - Just magic
description: The future of email enrichment is here. The only solution powered by algorithms with advanced built-in verification system. Delivering the industry's highest enrichment rates. No outdated databases - just real-time generated and accurate data.

name: SlashExperts
tagline: Help teams close faster by connecting buyers with real users
description: SlashExperts helps B2B teams close faster by connecting buyers with real users. Authentic peer conversations build trust, answer tough questions, and move deals without the friction of traditional sales tactics.
